description: This source file contains the implementation of an in-memory note repository class for a notes management backend, providing methods for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes in a thread-safe manner.

classes.name: InMemoryNoteRepository
classes.description: A thread-safe in-memory implementation of the INoteRepository interface, managing notes with concurrent access support.

methods.name: CreateAsync
methods.description: Creates and stores a new note asynchronously.

methods.name: GetAllAsync
methods.description: Retrieves all notes ordered by last updated timestamp asynchronously.

methods.name: GetByIdAsync
methods.description: Fetches a note by its ID asynchronously.

methods.name: UpdateAsync
methods.description: Updates an existing note asynchronously if it exists.

methods.name: DeleteAsync
methods.description: Deletes a note by ID asynchronously.
